kce.cn: 接受后将打印后厨单据，请确认
kce.en: Pls confirm after receiving the print houchu documents
Dishes addition for a standard dinner

kce.cn: 已经结账的自助餐订单请到pos完成操作
kce.en: Paid buffet order pls process with casher pos

kce.cn: 请到pos选择当前订单的自助餐餐标
kce.en: Pls select the buffet\'s standard price for the current order on pos

kce.cn: 预付金已扣除，下单成功
kce.en: The advance payment has been deducted and the order placed success

kce.cn: 该收银点没有配置需要的票据
kce.en: The cashier counter doesn\'t have the configuration required receipts

kce.cn: 若不指定收银点，默认跟随主收银设备的设置
kce.en: If cashier counter isn\'t designated, follow main cash register setup by default

kce.cn: 打印指定收银点（可多选）
您已经在该桌台了，无需要转台！
请确认顾客已离店，订单中未使用完的预付金不会退款，是否继续完结订单？
kce.en: Pls confirm that the customer has left the store. the unused prepayment in the order won\'t be refunded. continue to settle the order?
Has exceeded the maximum number of options
The amount do not participate in the discount

kce.cn: 不同类型的订单不能进行合单
kce.en: Different types of orders cannot be combined

kce.cn: 桌台上存在自助餐订单，不允许开台
kce.en: There are buffet orders on the table. the table isn\'t allowed to open

kce.cn: 桌台上存在正餐订单，不允许开台
kce.en: There is a dinner order on the table. the table isn\'t allowed to open

kce.cn: 不同类型的订单不能进行转台
kce.en: Different types of orders cannot be turned

kce.cn: 抱歉，自助餐订单不能合单
kce.en: Sorry, buffet orders can\'t be combined

kce.cn: 自助餐订单请到pos完成相关操作
kce.en: For buffet orders. pls complete the relevant operations on pos

kce.cn: 注：收到现金后请及时到pos清账并入钱箱，谢谢！
kce.en: Note: pls promptly clear the account at pos and put cash into cash drawer after receiving the cash. thank you!
Pls select the reson of giving gift?
Submit failure, whether to try again?
Do you want to give up this order
Failed to connect to the network, pls check
Dishes can only be added up to 999 copies

kce.cn: 刷卡支付已退款成功，如要继续退款，请在pos端对单据进行整单退货
kce.en: The credit card payment has been refunded successfully. if you want to continue the refund, pls return the entire return on the pos.

kce.cn: 该卡仅用于支付，暂不支持使用优惠
kce.en: This card can only make payments, no discount authorized.

kce.cn: 抱歉,自助餐作废请到pos操作
kce.en: Sorry, the buffet is invalid. pls operate on pos

kce.cn: 当前订单存在优惠信息，请到pos进行结账操作
kce.en: There is preference information in the current order, pls go to pos to do the settlement

kce.cn: 使用其他支付方式会清空会员价，请确认...
kce.en: Use other payment methods will clear this vip price, pls confirm...
Confirm to give up the checkout?

kce.cn: 确认结账信息无误并打印预结单？
kce.en: Confirm bill information and print out budget receipt?

kce.cn: 连接服务器失败,请稍后再试!
kce.en: Failed to connect to the server. pls try again later!
Click here to see the process

kce.cn: 当前积分不满足使用条件
kce.en: Current points don\'t meet the conditions of use

kce.cn: 数据异常,请重新登录后,再操作!
kce.en: Data is abnormal. pls log in again before operating!

kce.cn: 退款金额大于支付押金
kce.en: The refund amount is greater than the payment deposit

kce.cn: 注:押金在用餐完毕后原路退回
kce.en: Note: the deposit will be returned after the meal is completed.
The price of this dish can be modified
The note of the whole order

kce.cn: 抹零金额必须小余支付金额
kce.en: Wipe the amount of money must be less than the amount of payment

kce.cn: 自定义抹零金额必须大于零
kce.en: Custom wipe amount must be greater than zero

kce.cn: 发现订单已重复支付,请立即处理!
kce.en: Found that the order has been paid repeatedly. pls process it immediately!
After the meal is finished the deposit is refunded.

kce.cn: 该桌台订单已满，无法执行转台！
kce.en: The table is full of orders and it can not be turned
Failed to generate payment qr code!

kce.en: Use group purchase payment will clear the discount and other preferential information, pls confirm...
After the meal is finished the deposit is refunded.

kce.cn: 不满足优惠劵使用条件!
kce.en: Not satisfied with the discounted terms of use!

kce.cn: 当前输入的折让大于了您允许输入的最大折让
kce.en: The current input discount is greater than the maximum discount you allow to enter
Pls enter the no. of dishes

kce.cn: 您没有权限继续操作，请到后台勾选“会员点菜”！
kce.en: You don\'t have permission to continue operation. pls check \

kce.cn: 还未下单，不能打印预结单!
kce.en: No order has been placed yet. pre-orders cannot be printed!

kce.en: You have not placed an order yet, and you cannot operate additional fees!
This payment method is not supported

kce.cn: 此订单不能操作附加费

kce.en: There is no deposit for this order.

kce.cn: 该设备不支持此方式退款，请至pos处理
kce.en: The device does not support this way refund pls go to pos processing

kce.cn: 还未下单,不能操作附加费!
kce.en: You have not placed an order yet, and you cannot operate additional fees!

kce.cn: 订单未支付完成，确定要离开？
kce.en: The order has not been paid. are you sure to quit?

kce.cn: 退出后本订单只能到pos继续支付
kce.en: After exiting this order can only continue to pay to the pos

kce.en: The order is not automatically added when the table bottom is consumed

kce.cn: 该订单已被合单，无法进行该操作
点菜初始化失败,确定一键清理？

kce.cn: 该订单尚未支付完成，请到订单中心完成支付
kce.en: The order has not yet been paid, pls go to the order center to complete the payment

kce.cn: 订单支付状态发生变化，不能进行结账
kce.en: Order payment status has changed and can\'t be settled

kce.cn: 订单支付状态发生变化，请到订单中心继续结账

kce.cn: 重复支付只能先退乐富支付，如想继续操作其他支付方式退款，请pos上进行退款操作！

kce.en: discount range allows the value between 0~100 (0 and 100 are not included)
